meanings.definition: Make (something) necessary as a result or consequence.
meanings.sent1: Not having an umbrella necessitates finding shelter when it rains.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard necessitates good grades in school.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting your lunch necessitates a creative solution like sharing with a friend.
meanings.sent4: Lack of sleep necessitates a recharge like a phone battery.
meanings.sent5: Running out of gas in the middle of nowhere necessitates walking to the nearest gas station.

meanings.sent1: Being a doctor necessitates years of medical training.
meanings.sent2: A successful business necessitates careful planning and hard work.
meanings.sent3: Losing your keys necessitates a thorough search of the entire house.
meanings.sent4: A healthy lifestyle necessitates regular exercise and balanced nutrition.
meanings.sent5: Winning the championship necessitates dedication and teamwork.
